revised_title: Observations on the Russia Castor, Baths at Carlsbad, Salt-Mines Near Cracau, and Various Other Notable Locations
tldr: The author describes his observations of the Russia Castor, the hot springs at Carlsbad, and the salt mines near Cracau. He also discusses the geological formations and mineralogy of the region, including the formation of pisoliths and tophus, and the properties of the water in the hot springs.
